title: Megabites
subtitle: Recipe app built in React, Express, Node and MySQL
description: A recipe sharing app where users are free to create recipes, browse recipes posted by others, save recipes to their profiles, and post reviews on recipes.
login: Take it for a spin with user test@test.com and password test

title: School Spot
subtitle: Assignment app built with Express, Node, and MySQL
description: This application allows teachers and students to manage the student's assignments and grades. The teacher and student dashboards help to facilitate better communication and efficient grading of assignments.
login: Take it for a spin as a teacher with user TSmith@test.com or as a student with user SJones@test.com and both passwords test

title: Drinkin' Bad
subtitle: Drinking app based on Breaking Bad TV show
description: Inspired by the TV Drama 'Breaking Bad' (BB), this application presents the user with a drink choice. Each drink choice leads to an information mashup page with BB character info, a drink selection, and the reason why that drink matches the character.
login: There is no login needed to play this game
